principles: Typography-First Hierarchy (Big clean headings, high legibility)
Pill Accents (Buttons and tabs use max radius, containers stay rectilinear)
Pure Grayscale (Zero chroma, no color tint â€” mono only)

card.default: group flex flex-col gap-6 w-full cursor-pointer
card.imageWrapper: relative aspect-[4/3] w-full overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-neutral-100 transition-all duration-500 group-hover:shadow-lg
card.image: w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-700 group-hover:scale-105
card.title: text-2xl font-bold tracking-tight text-neutral-950 transition-colors group-hover:text-neutral-600

button.primary: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-neutral-950 px-6 py-3 text-sm lg:text-base font-medium text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-neutral-800 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-neutral-950 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 transition-colors
button.secondary: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full border border-neutral-200 bg-white px-6 py-3 text-sm lg:text-base font-medium text-neutral-950 shadow-sm hover:bg-neutral-50 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-neutral-950 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 transition-colors
button.ghost: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-6 py-3 text-sm lg:text-base font-medium text-neutral-600 hover:bg-neutral-100 hover:text-neutral-950 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-neutral-950 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 transition-colors
button._note: All button variants use rounded-full (pill shape). This is a core editorial-tech design decision.

tab.list: inline-flex items-center gap-1 rounded-full bg-neutral-100 p-1
tab.trigger: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-5 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-500 transition-all hover:text-neutral-950 data-[state=active]:bg-white data-[state=active]:text-neutral-950 data-[state=active]:shadow-sm
tab._note: Tabs use pill container (rounded-full list) with pill triggers. Active state gets white bg with shadow.

input.default: flex h-12 w-full rounded-xl border border-neutral-300 bg-white px-4 py-2 text-base ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-neutral-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-neutral-950 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 transition-all
input._note: Inputs use rounded-xl (moderate radius), NOT pill. Only buttons and tabs are pill.

badge.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-transparent bg-neutral-950 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-white hover:bg-neutral-800 transition-colors
badge.secondary: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-transparent bg-neutral-100 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-neutral-950 hover:bg-neutral-200 transition-colors
badge.outline: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-neutral-300 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-neutral-950 transition-colors

table.wrapper: relative w-full overflow-auto rounded-xl border border-neutral-200
table.head: h-14 px-6 text-left align-middle font-medium text-neutral-500 [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

typography.h1: scroll-m-20 text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight text-neutral-950 lg:text-6xl
typography.h2: scroll-m-20 border-b border-neutral-200 pb-4 mt-16 text-4xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-neutral-950 first:mt-0
typography.h3: scroll-m-20 mt-12 text-3xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-neutral-950
typography.h4: scroll-m-20 mt-8 text-2xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-neutral-950
typography.blockquote: mt-8 border-l-4 border-neutral-200 pl-6 italic text-neutral-500 text-lg lg:text-xl
typography.list: my-8 ml-8 list-disc text-base lg:text-lg text-neutral-600 [&>li]:mt-3
